snippet.title: Can America’s Grasslands Be Saved?
snippet.description:
* Can America’s Grasslands Be Saved? , found that 1.3 million acres of grassland had been converted to corn and soybeans between 2006 and 2011 in North Dakota […] , South Dakota, Nebraska, Minnesota and Iowa. Native prairie — whose plants have deep and extensive root systems — is a very […] don’t realize how much carbon is stored in a a prairie,” said Fargione. “It’s in the roots of the plants and also in the
14 weeks ago

snippet.title: Powder River Basin: Coal on the move
snippet.description:
* Powder River Basin: Coal on the move rich subtropical swampland for millions of years.
